website_summaries.verdict: Fast growing seed from a solid brand that's a great fit for northern states (as it's not especially heat tolerant). Germinates swiftly, comes up strong, and fills in well over time.
pros: Germinates well, typically popping up in a week to 10 days
Works nicely for full lawns, or to patch bare spots in both sunny shady areas
Customers brag of fast and robust growth
cons: Not as heat tolerant as others on our list
Few complaints, but backed by a moneyback guarantee just in case

customer_reviews.title: Best grass seed
customer_reviews.text: This grass seed is simply the best. I raked my lawn then used an aerator then spread the seed, applied seed starter fertilizer and watered it twice a day. After 1 week, started to see grass emerge! After a week and a half, WOW the new grass is taking off. Have tried other seed but never got results like this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect any growth for at least 10 days
customer_reviews.text: There weren’t any reviews that had pictures, so I figured I would add some. The first pic is from the first day I spread a 7lb bag in the back yard. The second is a month later; however, it is worth noting I purchase a 2nd 7lb bag sometime in between and added it in. I just purchased a 3rd 7lb bag to fill in the gaps more. In hindsight, I would’ve purchased the 20lb bag initially. I have watered it everyday, it’s in a mostly shady area, and I live in Portland Oregon. Updated: last picture is a few months in- looking good and growing strong :)
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME, BEAUTIFUL AND GREW FAST.  NOT IF I COULD JUST GET RID OF THE CLOVER IN MY GRASS
customer_reviews.text: SEEMS AFTER SEEDING AND LOTS OF RAIN COMING UP NICELY, TIME WILL TELL BUT, SO FAR SO GOOD I ORDERED ANOTHER PACKAGE OF THIS GRASS, MY LAWN IS THE GREENEST IN THE AREA GOT RID OF THE CLOVER...
customer_reviews.author: L J S

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Seeded them in December in Austin, within 2 weeks the grass is already coming through, didn't even water much either. The only thing I did was to rake and use a spiked aerator before seeding and after just to ensure the seeds are going in the soil and not sitting on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: bd

customer_reviews.title: grass is growing
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this purchase. I purchased Scott Turf Builder in the past and did not get good results.....got good results with this seed. The grass started growing in about two weeks! It is kind of patchy in certain areas but that could be due to uneven distribution of the seeds with the spreader. I really think the success is with the preparation of the soil: I raked the soil to loosen it up, spread the seeds and raked top soil onto the existing soil to cover the seeds. I watered the lawn every day for about 15 minutes. It seemed to do the job!
customer_reviews.author: John F. Vreeland

customer_reviews.title: High Quality seed
customer_reviews.text: Great Product by GreenView just like all of their product lines.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Payne

customer_reviews.title: NOT!
customer_reviews.text: I spread these seeds, topped with thin layer of lawn soil plus rain/water and after 3 weeks nothing happens. Don’t waste your money and all the work, it’s DOA!
customer_reviews.author: Raymund

customer_reviews.title: Actual functioning grass seed
customer_reviews.text: My grass seed purchases in the past were purely ornamental and never resulted in any grass, perhaps a snack for the birds and nothing more. I planted this instead of just throwing it around the yard and the grass was so hardy that it’s actually lived longer than the other grass that died when it got hot. Gracias for the Grass :)
customer_reviews.author: N M

customer_reviews.title: This didn't grow any grass - maybe it needs colder weather?
customer_reviews.text: I planted this and watered it twice a day. It did not produce even a single blade of grass. After planting, I noticed some of the reviews said this is for cooler climates. Maybe that was the problem? I didn't see anything in the listing about that so I was not aware. It was a wast of time and money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Grass seed that grows!
customer_reviews.text: Started out trying on several large area dead spots in my lawn. Prepared the areas, spread seed and covered with about a 1/4 inch top soil. I have tried this for five years with many different grass seed suppliers and No success. This grass seed has not only started and grown, but in areas with sun and shade. I, for one, am buying more and will highly recommend to my friends. Watered daily but not more than once a day when starting seedlings.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Schneiderwent

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I've not used it alot yet so I can't really give a true review yet.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Haris

customer_reviews.title: Impressive seed
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time attempting to plant grass. I saw from other brands that it becomes very difficult to grow, so I went by customer review and have been very impressed by the results. I just ordered more for the rest of my lawn too. I used this in conjunction with the GreenView Fairway Formula Seeding Success Biodegradable Mulch with Fertilizer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Results
customer_reviews.text: I live in a cool coastal climate (San Francisco) and had excellent results with the sun and shade seed mix; the ryegrass thrives here. I’ve tried other seed mixes from different sources. This company is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: GGFlieger

customer_reviews.title: Seeds grow faster with a little trick
customer_reviews.text: Easy to spread, and after 2 weeks i start see result , it grows faster when you spread the seeds and cover the spots with fresh cut grass on top and add water for at least 3 consecutive afternnon if you have a very dry yard like mine
customer_reviews.author: Samaritana Tainsh

customer_reviews.title: On the 7th day it was green!
customer_reviews.text: Planted this seed 7 days ago and I have green growth everywhere. Blades are strong. Will update after summer. This may be my new seed!!! No weeds in the mix. Can’t say the same for my lawn🙃
customer_reviews.author: TIM P.

customer_reviews.title: Winter grass. Burns up in Summer
customer_reviews.text: Grows fast. Not fescue. Does not tolerate heat Burns up in summer.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: I can see the difference
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great seed product. We are happy with our grass area. We recommend to follow the instructions to the letter for great results. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ObieOneTwo

customer_reviews.title: Isn't sprouting after one month
customer_reviews.text: It's grass seed. One should be able to loosen the dirt, apply the seed and step in and water it daily until it sprouts which it has not done after several weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Dead and useless
customer_reviews.text: MAYBE 5% came up. Do not waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: It has been over three weeks, no sign of new grass showing up. So, this is a total waste time of money. Followed instructions to the T.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L

customer_reviews.title: Great grass seed
customer_reviews.text: So surprised how it grew. Filled in 95% of my bare spots. Now my grass is nice and green. So far doing very well even in the las vegas sun
customer_reviews.author: cjvegas

customer_reviews.title: Impressed Floridian
customer_reviews.text: Within 4 days of putting out the grass seed, my little seeds started to germinate. Every neighbor is asking what brand I used because of how quickly and nicely the grass is growing in!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Nelson

customer_reviews.title: When to seed
customer_reviews.text: Grass seed did not pan out but might be my fault- I watered quite a bit as directed but maybe too soon in hot Az temperature?
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: poor product
customer_reviews.text: Seeded 9 days ago with rain 4 different times plus fertilizer and still no signs of grass
customer_reviews.author: john sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Germinated quick and thick.
customer_reviews.text: Germinated quickly and now i have a nice looking (dark green) lawn. In three weeks it was almost ready to walk on. And i tested a small area for germination rate and it seems it was very high. It is a little expensive for a small budget though. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MKE14

customer_reviews.title: I got nothin
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst grass seed I have ever used. I could not detect a single blade being produced from this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: packratpastor

customer_reviews.title: UGH  !!
customer_reviews.text: I have planted alot of grass seed with good results No results with this SEED ? Nothing grew
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Worthless, followed the directions, maybe one in 10,000 seeds germinated.
customer_reviews.author: Bebes papa

customer_reviews.title: filled in bare spot
customer_reviews.text: I like this grass seed just make sure you water the seed enough
customer_reviews.author: Diane V.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to grow. Blades are thin. Grew faster than what packaging said
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Nothing sprouted
customer_reviews.text: Spread new topsoil, added seeds, watered daily; and not a single sprout of grass. When I mix the soil I can still see the seeds. Not effective.
customer_reviews.author: Travis M.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I have baby grass jumping up in less than a week. I wasn't expecting much but looks like this will fill in the brown patches left from killing the weeds with the Spectracide sprayer I used a month ago.
customer_reviews.author: Dale C.

customer_reviews.title: Bad bag of seed???
customer_reviews.text: I put this down 2 weeks ago and it's still not sprouting! And yes, I followed all the rules! I've had seed before that I didn't even prepare the ground and it grew.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Easy purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not sure exactly how well this grass seed is growing / weather is not the best right now
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: This product is worth the price, very pleased with the results
customer_reviews.text: This product is of very good quality, very pleased with final results, growth through the fall was very impressive, can’t wait to see what nest spring has in store. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: charles d.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure to keep it very moist and it will grow! It is beautiful, thick grass and took about 2 weeks to fully come in.
customer_reviews.author: EMB

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Did everything as directed but grass dies after 2 weeks. Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seed
customer_reviews.text: Break the soil surface with a weasel and this seed will germinate and grow into a nice lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: It’s the only one I’ve found to grow grass in my back yard in years
customer_reviews.text: It’s the only one I’ve found to grow grass in my back yard in years
customer_reviews.author: Marylu Meeth

customer_reviews.title: Only received partial order
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two bags of grass seed, only received one bag.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Fogarty

product_meta.title: GreenView 2829336 Fairway Formula Grass Seed Sun & Shade Mixture, 3 lb
product_meta.description: Size:3 lb.GreenView Fairway Formula Grass Seed Sun & Shade Grass Seed Mixture guarantees a thick, lush, deep green lawn that will thrive in sunny and shady areas. This top-rated, cool season, versatile mixture of grass seed varieties will ensure that you are creating a lawn that is easy to grow, drought and disease resistant, and will stay green in extreme conditions throughout the year.
feature_bullets: For use in both sun and shade areas of the lawn, best with 4-8 hours of filtered sun per day
Fast seed germination in 7-10 days for quickly established lawns
Enhanced seed variety for heat, drought, and insect resistant areas
Mixture of top-rated, premium quality seed blends that are 99.9% weed free
Uncoated seeds ensure maximum seed coverage; 750 sq ft coverage if seeding new lawn; 1,500 sq ft coverage if over seeding existing lawn
Pair with GreenView Fairway Formula Grass Seed Seeding Success, a biodegradable mulch with fertilizer that protects grass seed while it germinates
GreenView Yard Wide Guarantee: Your Satisfaction or Your Money Back

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars266 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
